title: Meme-Based Problem-Based Learning (PBL) Course for Basic Medical Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic medical terminology
context.additional_context: A course for medical professionals to acquire foundational medical concepts through creative methods, emphasizing digital device use and peer learning.

learning_goals: Learners accurately understand core concepts in pathology and physiology and can reconstruct them into memes.
Learners can explain over 80% of foundational medical knowledge by analyzing peers' memes.
Learners self-assess that their creative problem-solving skills have improved by at least two levels through PBL activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
